text: Saratov Oblast (, Saratovskaya oblast) is a administrative division of Russia. ==Geography== Saratov Oblast is located in southeast of European Russia, in northern part of Lower Volga region and borders are: * Volgograd Oblast to south * Voronezh and Tambov oblasts to west * Penza, Samara and Ulyanovsk oblasts to north; * Republic of Kazakhstan to east. == Demographics == In terms of people,Russian Federal State Statistics Service (2011). "Всероссийская перепись населения 2010 года. Том 1" 2010 All-Russian Population Census, vol. 1. Всероссийская перепись населения 2010 года (2010 All-Russia Population Census) (in Russian). Russian Federal State Statistics Service. Retrieved January 15, 2018. population of this oblast: 2,521,892 (2010). Ethnic composition (2010): * Russians - 87.6% * Tatars - 2.2% * others - 2.1% == Religion == A 2012 survey showed these are the major religions in the oblast:Arena - Atlas of Religions and Nationalities in Russia. Sreda.org2012 Survey Maps. "Ogonek", № 34 (5243), 27/08/2012. Archived version Retrieved 15-01-2018. ==Related pages== * Russia == References ==
title: Saratov Oblast
